text: Michael Conlan (born 19 November 1991) is an Irish boxer who got a bronze medal at the 2012 Summer Olympics representing Ireland. He is currently 3rd in the world in his division, the fly. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Irish boxers Category:Olympic medalists for Ireland Category:Olympic bronze medalists Category:Sportspeople from Belfast Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Olympics
title: Michael Conlan
